text: Nia meegai aanei la anga gi digau Levi, idimaa digaula nadau henua donu ai, ge anga labelaa gi digau henua gee, digau guu mmade nadau maadua, mo nia ahina guu mmade nadau lodo ala e noho i lodo godou waahale. Digaula belee lloomoi e kae nadau mee huogodoo ala e dee dohu i nadau baahi. Heia di hai deenei, gei Dimaadua di godou God, ga hagahumalia goodou i godou mee huogodoo ala ma gaa hai.
